title: League is broken
body: 10 min into my game my screen turned green and my computer screen went black. When ever i would log out and back in the same thing would happend. Plz riot

replies.body:
Green??  That's really strange!  Could you still hear sounds in-game?  Your driver or hardware might have failed to render the game and crashed on you.  I would double check your air vents to make sure there's no overheating going on, then hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a closer look at your issue.

Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as well to collect some logs for context, and attach it to your ticket so we can check it out.
